content: I'm updating FHIR IG processes in Confluence and would like to include the recommended Confluence pages that new IG developers must review when getting started. Can anyone point me to the pages? Cross posting to IG Creation stream in case that's a better place to ask :)
I'm slightly worried nobody has touched that doc since I wrote it 18 months ago...
Anybody know if it's all still true?
It works but if you delete the branch via the Github web interface, it can cause issues with your local copy
